# í™”ìƒìƒë‹´ì„ ìœ„í•œ Janus êµ¬ì„±

<aside>
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Janusë¥¼ ìš°ë¶„íˆ¬ì— ì„¤ì¹˜í•˜ë©´ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ ì •ë¦¬
Stun ì„œë²„ì™€ Turn ì„œë²„ë¥¼ ìœ„í•œ Coturn Serverë„ í•¨ê»˜ ì„¤ì¹˜
</aside>

## í™˜ê²½êµ¬ì„±

- Ubuntu 18.04 bionic
- Python 3.7

## ì„¤ì¹˜ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ ì •ë¦¬

1. íŒŒì´ì¬ ë° ê¸°ë³¸ ì†Œí”„íŠ¸ì›¨ì–´ ì„¤ì¹˜
2. Janus ì„¤ì¹˜
    
    [How to install Janus Gateway in Ubuntu Server 18.04](https://ourcodeworld.com/articles/read/1197/how-to-install-janus-gateway-in-ubuntu-server-18-04)
    
    - Janus ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        packagelist=( 
        git 
        libmicrohttpd-dev 
        libjansson-dev 
        libssl-dev 
        libsrtp-dev 
        libsofia-sip-ua-dev 
        libglib2.0-dev 
        libopus-dev 
        libogg-dev 
        libcurl4-openssl-dev 
        liblua5.3-dev 
        libconfig-dev 
        pkg-config 
        gengetopt 
        libtool 
        automake 
        gtk-doc-tools 
        cmake 
        ) 
        apt-get install ${packagelist[@]}
        ```
        
    - libnice ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        *â€» ìµœì†Œ íŒŒì´ì¬ 3.7ì„ ìš”êµ¬í•œë‹¤.* 
        
        ```bash
        pip3 install meson==0.61.5 
        ln -s /usr/local/bin/meson /usr/bin/ 
        wget https://github.com/ninja-build/ninja/releases/download/v1.10.1/ninja-linux.zip 
        unzip ninja-linux.zip 
        cp ninja /usr/bin/ 
        git clone https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/libnice/libnice.git
        cd libnice 
        meson --prefix=/usr build 
        ninja -C build 
        ninja -C build install
        ```
        
    - libstrp ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        wget https://github.com/cisco/libsrtp/archive/v2.2.0.tar.gz 
        tar xfv v2.2.0.tar.gz 
        cd libsrtp-2.2.0 
        ./configure â€”prefix=/usr â€”enable-openssl 
        make shared_library && make install
        ```
        
    - usrctp ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/sctplab/usrsctp 
        cd usrsctp 
        ./bootstrap 
        ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install
        ```
        
    - libwebsockets ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/warmcat/libwebsockets.git 
        cd libwebsockets 
        mkdir build 
        cd build 
        cmake -DLWS_MAX_SMP=1 -LWS_IPV6=ON -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/usr -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS="-fpic" .. 
        make && make install
        ```
        
    - mqtt ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.c.git 
        cd paho.mqtt.c 
        prefix=/usr make install
        ```
        
    - NanoMSG ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        apt-get install libnanomsg-dev -y
        ```
        
    - RabbitMQ C AMQP ì„¤ì¹˜
        
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/alanxz/rabbitmq-c 
        cd rabbitmq-c 
        git submodule init 
        git submodule update 
        mkdir build && cd build 
        cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..
        make && make install
        ```
        
    - janus ì»´íŒŒì¼ë§
        
        ```bash
        git clone https://github.com/meetecho/janus-gateway.git
        cd janus-gateway
        sh autogen.sh
        ./configure â€”prefix=/opt/janus
        make && make install
        make configs
        ```
        
3. Janus ì„¤ì •
    
    ì„¤ì • íŒŒì¼ ìœ„ì¹˜ : /opt/janus/etc/janus
    
    - janus.jcfg

    - janus.plugin.videoroom.jcfg

4. Coturn ì„¤ì¹˜
